title: Implement output/detail pane (right)
description:
Implement renderOutputPane() function:

Layout:
- Flexible width (total - 35 - borders)
- Rounded border (gray when unfocused, blue when focused)
- Header: 'Agent Output' or 'Output (45%)' with scroll percentage
- Content: viewport.Model for scrollable output

Content modes:
1. Running mode: Shows streaming agent output
   - Append new output chunks
   - Auto-scroll to bottom on new content
   - Show spinner in header if actively running

2. Detail mode (when paused or viewing history):
   - Show selected task details
   - ID, Status, Title
   - BlockedBy list if any
   - Recent output for that task

Viewport setup:
- Initialize viewport with calculated dimensions
- Handle scroll via ctrl+u/ctrl+d when focused
- Show scroll percentage in header when content overflows

Styling:
- Monospace output text
- Dim gray for old output, bright for recent
- Use viewport.GotoBottom() on new output
